mapper.select: select img.img_num as imgNum, img.img_m_id as m_id, img.img_dir_num as dirNum, img.img_o_name as imgOriName, img.img_size as imgLength, img.img_s_name as imgName, img.img_thumb as imgThumb, img.img_format as imgFormat from image img, dir where img.img_dir_num=dir.dir_num and img.img_dir_num=(select dir_num from dir where dir_m_id=#{m_id} and dir_name=#{dirName})
mapper.update: update image set imgThumb where imgNum=#{imgNum}
